body.name: Amazon Basics Wide Ruled 8.5 x 11.75-Inch 50 Sheet Lined Writing Note Pad, Pack of 6, 300 Count, Multicolor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 4 hrs 48 mins
features: 6-pack of 50-sheet note pads; 2 of each pastel color (Pink, Orchid, and Blue) for optional color coding; ideal for home, school, or office
Wide ruled with 11/32 inch line spacing for larger handwriting and easier reading and transcribing
Sturdy chipboard backing for added writing pad support
Perforated top for easy removal of the letter-size sheets from the pad
Left-side margin and title space for organizing notes
Product Dimensions: 8-1/2 x 11-3/4 inches (WxL, including binding)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient and Reliable - AmazonBasics Wide Ruled Notepad!
reviews.reviewText: The AmazonBasics Wide Ruled Writing Notepad has been an excellent purchase. Its wide-ruled lines are perfect for precise, organized note-taking. The paper quality is impressive, preventing ink bleed-through, which is great for gel pens or markers. Each page tears off cleanly, thanks to the well-designed perforation. The notepad’s sturdiness and durability make it ideal for office and personal use. It offers excellent value for its price, making it a practical choice for anyone needing reliable, everyday notepads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality for price
reviews.reviewText: These are really good quality for the price you pay for and since they come in different colors you can use them as notebooks for different classes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, Convenient, and Cost-Effective
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics Narrow Ruled Lined Writing Note Pad, measuring 5 inches by 8 inches and available in a pack of 12, has become an essential part of my daily note-taking and organization routine. This unassuming yet reliable writing pad embodies simplicity, functionality, and excellent value for anyone in need of a practical and cost-effective solution. We always have one of the counter for my honey do list, grocery list, and other to-do's.One of the standout features is the compact size of these note pads. The 5x8-inch dimensions strike the perfect balance between portability and writing space. They easily fit into pockets, bags, or notebooks, making them ideal for on-the-go note-taking or quick jotting down of thoughts and ideas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for lists and notes to send the kids to school with
reviews.reviewText: Its your basic notepad at a decent price. Nothing special, just does what you need it to do. I like buying several at once so I can put them in various places where I need them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fine quality paper but with flimsy backing
reviews.reviewText: The paper is relatively thin for legal pads and the backing is flimsy. They work for me as they are only for use in my office. If I were to need them sturdier for transport I would buy a different brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Notes, Letters or To-Do Lists
reviews.reviewText: I've bought these "baby legal pads" before and was so glad to find them in Amazon Basics! I was able to stock up with pink, purple, and blue paper, with some wide lined and some "college ruled." They fit into most greeting card envelopes with just one fold, so I can add a note and not write all over the card. I send a great many cards (I know, a dying habit) and often I haven't seen the person in a while, so a little paper chat helps keep in touch, *I sent rny granddaughter 85 pages in her birthday card (haven't seen her since July), and my other one a 72 (i Think) page one. These little pages are perfect size for all of Grandma's helpful un-asked-for advice. Sometimes paper on a pad doesn't tear of well. This paper does - it tears clean across the top - and there's no yucky glue residue anywhere, since it isn't glued. It's more of a perforated tear=away. I adore these pads, and I hope Amazon Basic keeps stocking them. They are WONDERFUL!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough good things about the Writing Note Pad. It is an absolute game changer for anyone who loves writing. The narrow ruled lined format offers the perfect balance between structure and freedom, allowing me to take notes, jot down ideas, or even write full-length pieces with ease. The quality of the paper is excellent, ensuring a smooth writing experience every time. With the Writing Note Pad by my side, my thoughts flow effortlessly onto paper, making it an indispensable tool in my creative process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are awesome note pads. The paper is the right thickness and is good quality. I don’t see any reason to give them less than five stars. They’re a great deal too.
Son de calidad, llegaron en buen estado y antes de tiempo, se me hacen un poco caros pero de ahí todo muy bien.
Bought the bigger set as well and like the colors for coordinating and organizing different notes.
Love the pastel assortment of colors, it can makes working just a little brighter. I do wish they were sticky at the top or peeled off better, however they do the trick just fine
Perfect size of notepad for what I was looking for. Good value for the money. Quality paper.
Excelente color, tamaño y resistencia del papel. Es un block muy útil.
